    • Constructor Detail

      • Connect4Server

        public Connect4Server(int port,
                      Connect4Controller controller)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Instantiates a server object and creates a connection to the client
        Parameters:
        port - port number to be used for ServerSocket
        controller - Controller instance of the game
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - in the case where a server instance is already running in the same host

    • Method Detail

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(Connect4MoveMessage message)
        This method transmits a message to the client by using a new thread.
        Parameters:
        message - Connect4MoveMessage instance to be sent

      • waitForMessage

        public void waitForMessage()
        This method creates a new thread to wait for a new move message to be transmitted by the client. After that, it calls for the controller to handle the move.

      • closeConnection

        public void closeConnection()
        This method closes the server socket.
